mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER(ID, PW, GENDER, NICK, REGION, HOBBY, PHONE, TUTORIAL_ST, PROFILE_IMG, USER_ROLE, JOINED_AT) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{gender}, #{nick}, #{region}, #{hobby}, #{phone}, #{tutorialSt}, #{profileImg}, #{userRole} ,#{joinedAt})
INSERT INTO tbl_schedule (sche_title, sche_content, sche_st_date, sche_end_date, group_no) VALUES (#{scheTitle}, #{scheContent}, #{scheStDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{scheEndDate, jdbcType=DATE}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT SCHE_NO AS scheNo, SCHE_TITLE AS scheTitle, SCHE_ST_DATE AS scheStDate, SCHE_END_DATE AS scheEndDate, SCHE_CONTENT AS scheContent FROM TBL_SCHEDULE
SELECT ROWNUM , GROUP_CATEGORY, GROUP_LIKES, GROUP_NAME FROM (SELECT GROUP_CATEGORY, GROUP_LIKES, GROUP_NAME FROM TBL_GROUP ORDER BY GROUP_LIKES DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=4

SELECT ROWNUM, GROUP_CATEGORY, GROUP_LIKES, GROUP_NAME FROM ( SELECT GROUP_CATEGORY, GROUP_LIKES, GROUP_NAME FROM TBL_GROUP WHERE GROUP_CATEGORY = #{groupCategory, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY GROUP_LIKES DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_FILE(COMM_NO, FILE_NAME, FILE_ORI_NAME, FILE_THUMB, FILE_S3_PATH, FILE_SIZE, EXT, UPLOADED_AT) VALUES(#{commNo} , #{fileName}, #{fileOriName}, #{fileThumb}, #{fileS3Path}, #{fileSize}, #{ext}, #{uploadedAt})
